metadata.title: CVE-2025-0244 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: When redirecting to an invalid protocol scheme, an attacker could spoof theaddress bar.*Note: This issue only affected Android operating systems. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
